name: Wide Open
description:
The Wide Open Big Cartel Theme offers a clean, minimalist layout with a wide horizontal navigation bar and large featured slideshow.

Theme Features

  • Theme includes slideshow functionality on the Home Page. Display photos of your own choosing, or pull photos from your Flickr stream automatically.
  • Custom Header image to showcase your brand's logo and tagline.
  • A customizable navigation bar to establish a user-friendly, functional website.
  • Blog integration to keep your customers up to date with your latest news and promotions.
  • A search bar to help viewers find exactly what they’re looking for.

Included Custom Options

At Makery, we’ll take the time to customize your template, changing the fonts, colors, and banner to fit your brand. With our templates, you get a personalized design process without a huge investment.

Complete Big Cartel Integration

When you install a Makery theme, your Big Cartel Dashboard remains unchanged. You'll be to upload and edit products as easily as you have in the past. You'll also be able to add custom pages, like About, FAQ, Press, or Policies. All of your current products will remain in place, and you won't have to re-upload any product information.

Furthermore, integration with your existing Big Cartel design controls means you can change the colors and settings on your new Makery theme to suit your brand's style.

Free Installation

We're a full service shop. After you purchase a Makery Big Cartel Theme, we will contact you to arrange installation. Installation of theme files can be a lengthy and tricky process, and we prefer to take care of everything for our clients.

View a live Demo

name: Cream Soda
description:
The Cream Soda Big Cartel Theme offers a clean, warm layout with a sidebar, horizontal navigation bar, and large featured slideshow.

Theme Features

  • Theme includes slideshow functionality on the Home Page. Display photos of your own choosing, or pull photos from your Flickr stream automatically.
  • Custom Header image to showcase your brand's logo and tagline.
  • Social networking buttons so your customers can connect with your brand.
  • A customizable navigation bar and an organized sidebar on the left side to establish a user-friendly, functional website.

name: Hot Chocolate
description:
The Hot Chocolate Big Cartel Theme offers a structured layout with a featured sidebar and integrated newsletter.

Theme Features

  • Expansive gallery showcases four columns of images, one-upping Big Cartel’s default three-column format. Show off more of your products at once.
  • Custom Header image to showcase your brand's logo and tagline.
  • A newsletter sign-up section to keep your customers connected and up-to-date with your products, special offers, and news.
  • Detailed sidebar navigation to feature newest products, top selling items, and categories.
  • Blog integration to keep your customers up to date with your latest news and promotions.
  • A search bar to help viewers find exactly what they’re looking for.

Included Custom Options

At Makery, we’ll take the time to customize your template, changing the fonts, colors, and banner to fit your brand. With our templates, you get a personalized design process without a huge investment.

name: Lemonade

name: Iced Tea
